label: AnimalCertification
comment: The process of certifying that a certain animal has met performance and quality assurance requirements, or qualification requirements as stipulated in regulations.

datatypeProperties.comment: An assertion, expressed as text, for this animal certification.
A code specifying an assertion for this specified certification, such as a claim that a product is free of hazardous chemicals.
A responsible agency, expressed as text, for this specified certification.
A standard, expressed as text, for this specified certification.

objectProperties.comment: A referenced location related to this animal certification.
A sustainability assertion for this specified certification.

referencedBy.comment: An animal certification applicable to this animal certificate.
